snippet: Gov. John R. Kasich on Monday sidestepped a decision about whether an inmate is too fat to be humanely executed by sparing him on the ground that he had poor legal representation.
abstract: Ohio Gov John R Kasich sidesteps decision about whether inmate Ronald Post is too fat to be humanely executed by granting him clemency on ground that he had poor legal representation.
lead_paragraph: Gov. John R. Kasich on Monday sidestepped a decision about whether an inmate is too fat to be humanely executed by sparing him on the ground that he had poor legal representation.

headline.print_headline:
Ohio: Clemency Avoids
Issue of Inmate’s Obesity
